Maven protobuf plugin

This plugin adds support of compilation of Google Protobuf files with maven during the build.

Goals Overview

  • protobuf:run Compiles protobuf files with protoc compiler

Usage

General instructions on how to use the Dependency Plugin can be found on the usage page.
